title: Stats UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user finished on-boarding

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to Stats tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* TV and Audio icons (if the user did not select a favorite team)
* By Class/By League Filter
* League-Specific Filter
* Batting/Pitching Dropdown
* Stats Data (based on the selected team and stat)
* Statistics Key

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to Stats tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the navigation bar complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly 

THEN the app will display the content of that tab in a scale to fit manner (if the user did not select a favorite team)

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: TV Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Team Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* Class picker
* Date (Day Month Date)
* Arrows to navigate through the date (next/previous date)
* Video list (if available depending on the selected date)
* Done button

title: Audio Icon (iOS only)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user did not select a favorite team

GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Audio icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the Gameday Audio page in the app

THEN the app will not use any third-party application to open the Gameday Audio page

title: By Class Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "By Class" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the class dropdown will have the following:

* Triple-A
* Double-A
* Class A Advanced
* Class A Full Season
* Class A Short Season
* Rookie

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a class in the dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will update the stats displayed based on the user's selection

title: By League Filter
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "By League" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the league dropdown will have the following: 

* International League
* Pacific Coast League
* Mexican League
* Eastern League
* Southern League
* Texas League
* California League
* Carolina League
* Florida State League
* Midwest League
* South Atlantic League
* New York-Penn League
* Northwest League
* Appalachian League
* Pioneer League
* Arizona League
* Gulf Coast League
* Dominican Summer League

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a league in the dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will update the stats displayed based on the user's selection

title: Batting/Pitching Dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display: 

* -Batting
* Average
* Runs
* Home Runs
* RBI
* Stolen Bases
* Games
* At Bats
* Hits
* Doubles
* Triples
* Total Bases
* Walks
* Strikeouts 
* Caught Stealing
* On-base %
* Slugging %
* OPS
* -Pitching
* Wins
* Saves
* Strikeouts
* ERA
* WHIP
* Losses
* Games
* Starts
* Complete Games
* Shutouts
* Innings
* Hits
* Runs
* Earned Runs
* Home Runs
* Walks
* Holds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on an item in the dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will update the stats displayed based on the user's selection

title: Stats Data
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user finished on-boarding
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to Stats tab
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the Stats with the following information:

* Name
* Team
* Batting/Pitching Stats based on the filter selected
* Statistics Key at the bottom of the page

title: Batting
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "Average" in the Stats dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN then the app will display the following stats:

* Name
* Team
* POS
* G
* AB
* AVG

THEN the app will highlight the AVG column 

THEN the app will display the Statistics Key at the bottom of the page

title: Statistics Key Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to Stats tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects a stat in 'Batting'

WHEN the user taps on "Statistics Key" Button at the bottom of the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* G: Games Played
* AB: At Bats
* R: Runs
* H: Hits
* 2B: Doubles
* 3B: Triples
* HR: Home Runs
* RBI: Runs Batted In
* TB: Total Bases
* BB: Bases on Balls (Walks)
* SO: Strikeouts
* SB: Stolen Bases
* CS: Caught Stealing
* OBP: On-base Percentage
* SLG: Slugging Percentage
* AVG: Batting Average
* OPS: On-base Plus Slugging Percentage

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects a stat in 'Pitching'

WHEN the user taps on "Statistics Key" Button at the bottom of the page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* W: Wins
* L: Losses
* ERA: Earned Run Average
* G: Games Played
* GS: Games Started
* CG: Complete Games
* SHO: Shutouts
* SV: Saves
* IP: Innings Pitched
* H: Hits Allowed
* R: Runs Allowed
* ER: Earned Runs Allowed
* HR: Home Runs Allowed
* BB: Bases on Balls (Walks) Allowed
* SO: Strikeouts
* WHIPS: Walks + Hits/Innings Pitched
* HLD: Holds
